cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.4)

project("WindowsDLL")


list(APPEND CMAKE_MODULE_PATH "${CMAKE_CURRENT_LIST_DIR}/../../../../cmake")
include(Reprojucer)


if(NOT DEFINED WindowsDLL_jucer_FILE)
  message(FATAL_ERROR "WindowsDLL_jucer_FILE must be defined")
endif()

get_filename_component(WindowsDLL_jucer_FILE
  "${WindowsDLL_jucer_FILE}" ABSOLUTE
  BASE_DIR "${CMAKE_BINARY_DIR}"
)


jucer_project_begin(
  JUCER_VERSION "5.4.7"
  PROJECT_FILE "${WindowsDLL_jucer_FILE}"
  PROJECT_ID "IvabE4"
)

jucer_project_settings(
  PROJECT_NAME "WindowsDLL"
  PROJECT_VERSION "1.0.0"
  COMPANY_NAME "ROLI Ltd."
  COMPANY_COPYRIGHT "ROLI Ltd."

  DISPLAY_THE_JUCE_SPLASH_SCREEN OFF # Required for closed source applications without an Indie or Pro JUCE license

)
